resources.string: Enable to allow NotificationsWidget receive all incoming notifications. The disclaimer displayed when enabling the accessibility service is standard Android message. The app DOES NOT collect any data beside the needed data to display on widget. Please note that the app DOES NOT have Internet Access permission so it actually cannot send the data anywhere.
Wake device and turn screen on when new a notification arrives
Show a bar time, date and "clear all notifications" button
Show "clear all notifications" button in the clock bar
Set the opacity of the notification background
Service is inactive. please enable \"Notifications Widget\" service on Accessibility Settings, touch alert icon to open Accessibility Settings
When Accessibility Settings opens, select \"Notifications Widget\" and switch it from \"Off\" to \"On\". Touch \"OK\" in the warning dialog

After locking the screen, swipe the screen right and touch the + icon, choose \"Notifications Widget\" from the widget list, when the widget appears, swipe down to extend it touch it for few seconds and drag it to the right to replace the main clock widget
That\'s all. if you have any questions or issues - don\'t hesitate to contact us at admin@roymam.com
